text:
Question 153) A 3 -story hotel is being built. Each floor will have 100 rooms. The rooms will be numbered from 100 to 399 and each will have its number posted to the door. Each number will consist of individual pieces, each symbolizing a single digit.
What is the minimum amount of parts, symbolizing the digit 2, needed to identify the number of all rooms?
A) 160
B) 157
C) 130
D) 120
E) 60
